description: Niya Casablanca, Morocco's first vegan restaurant, is part of an international initiative focused on sustainable food projects. The restaurant aims to transform eating habits by promoting ethical consumption and environmental awareness. Through innovative vegan cuisine, Nia seeks to challenge misconceptions about plant-based diets while fostering a community around healthy, sustainable living. The initiative highlights the intersection of food, culture, and social responsibility in a rapidly changing culinary landscape.
name: Niya
